creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George R. Steiner
description: ceramic charger with full length image of William III of Orange
markings: \'W R\', in blue glaze, at top center of bowl; lender\'s sticker, at underside of base at center
object_name: Charger with portrait of William III
text: This charger, used as decoration either hung on a wall or placed on a dresser, commemorates the reign of William of Orange, King of England from 1689 to 1702.
title: Charger with portrait of William III
